content: Hi, like the mentions that on the forum of this multi game the problem that when you are red instead of giving you the char 'r' it still giving you the char 'w' as your color. please fix it.
In the rules it says that each player has 16 pieces. It should be 12 instead.
I think animation is wrong when you take enemy piece. first you should  jump over it and after that remove from the board.

hello I was a little disturbed because in the version I use to play on table the grid is 10x10 (apparently named 'Internationnal Draughts'). but there exist a version 'English draughts' which is on 8x8 board...

here are some of the different versions:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draughts

else I prefer to have white peaces instead of red ones...

providing the list of legal move is a good Idea for beginners. do you plan to make different ligues where the legal move list is not given?

I upvote, I agree with precedent remark, I will validate with that corrected!

Looking forward to seeing it in the multi section :)

Just a few minor points:
* There is no default game shown in the viewer?
* The default code just says "MOVE" instead of a possible move like "e3f4"
* Maybe make it uppercase letters to match the ones written at the edge of the board?
* optional: tooltips for coordinates, man, king
* input format: myColor should be above the loop, it doesn't change
* Is it me, or do the pieces have a white background? https://imgur.com/a/uAdoFat

Btw you could update your old contribution instead of creating a new one - but now leave it as it is ;)

"Allotted response time per turn is â‰¤ 50 seconds."
Is it really 50s, or is it 50ms?
BTW: Nice graphics!

I haven't actually set it to anything so I'm not sure what it is or what it should be.
I'll build a decent AI and test how much time it should need.
Thanks for the notes

Not sure how to add a default game. I'll have to check
I'll change that
Makes sense
Not sure how they work, maybe I'll learn how to do that later
I'll change that
Not sure why the mask didn't work for you. I only see the pieces not the background

I think the old version was to old, I tried to update it a few times, but it didn't allow me to. Solved with remove then add new.
Yeah I know, but I don't know how to get the animation to do that.

There are many versions and rule versions of this game. I used the rules that was solved to be a draw by brute force a few years ago. https://www.newscientist.com/article/dn12296-checkers-solved-after-years-of-number-crunching/

The traditional colors for checkers is usually Black and red with Black playing first, in contrast to chess.

I don't intend to remove the legal moves, if you are building a strong AI and don't need it, you can just ignore it
